sec.p:
The relativity density ( d 20) was determined using a 1-cm 3 pycnometer. The refractive index ( n 20) was measured by an Abbe's refractometer, manufactured by Boeco, Germany. The specific optical rotation
[ ‚àù ]
D
20
was determined in a Hanon P 810 automatic polarimeter. All these properties were expressed as mean values and standard deviations of four measurements.
